Explore bSims with Shiny apps

Peter Solymos

Source: vignettes/bsims04-apps.Rmd
bsims04-apps.Rmd

bSims comes with a few Shiny apps. These can be used to interactively explore the effects of different settings.

Compare distance functions:

run_app("distfunH")
run_app("distfunHER")

Compare simulation settings for a single landscape:

run_app("bsimsH")
run_app("bsimsHER")

The Shinylive versions of the apps can be found here:

  • distfunH
  • distfunHER
  • bsimsH
  • bsimsHER

Developed by Peter Solymos.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.3.
